Basic Things About Me 

My name is Mert Kagan Kabukcu 

I am 23 and I am studying Computer Engineering in Cukurova University 
 I love football and my favorite team is Galatasaray which is a team from Istanbul-Turkey 

 I was playing football in young team in Galatasaray as a left-back 
 My favorite hobbie after football is going to the cinema I try to do that twice a year for 6 years 
 Because of that I literally know almost every movie published past 6 years
